buildup.text: Supercell thunderstorms create a rotating updraft called a mesocyclone high in the clouds.

discovery.text: When that rotation tightens and touches the ground, a tornado is born.

twist.text: Most tornadoes last under 10 minutes. But in those minutes, they can erase entire neighborhoods.
